name: evil of all roots
description:
charming base defender made in 48 hours by Céline Veltman (art) & Ramon van Schaik (programming) during the 2023 Global Game Jam.

Gameplay:

- select your mother root to spawn new seeds and spores 
- at night you'll be attacked by horrid creatures, defend yourself!
- select adorable spores to fight and build
- you die when the mother root is destroyed
- there is no end, definitely not because we ran out of time.

Features: 

- sick day and night cycle 
- hand drawn artstyle 
- hand programmed code
- animations made with love
- tower defense gameplay 

we want to give a shout-out to chromatic aberration. Have fun playing!
